1:
Yahweh, I cry out to you;\q2 I plead for you to help me.
\q1
2:
I am bringing to you all my problems;\q2 I am telling you all my troubles.


\q1
3:
When I am very discouraged,\q2 you know what I should do.
\q1 Wherever I walk, it is as though my enemies have hidden traps for me to fall into.
\q1
4:
I look around,\q2 but there is no one who sees me,
\q2 no one who will protect me,
\q2 and no one who cares about what happens to me.
\q1
6:
Listen to me while I cry out to you for help\q2 because I am very distressed.
\q1 Rescue me
\q2 because those who make me suffer are very strong;
\q2 I cannot escape from them.
\q1
7:
Free me from my troubles\q2 so that I may thank you.
\q1 If you do that, when I am with others who live rightly,
\q2 I will praise you for having been very good to me.
